name: Card Layout - Deck
description: Add a set of cards to cause them to be equal width and height that aren't attached to one another

attribute_definition_groups.name: Container Max Width
attribute_definition_groups.description: What is the max-width this container should be allowed to grow to?

attribute_definitions.name: Container Max Width
attribute_definitions.description: The max-width the container is allowed to grow across all device widths.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Number of Cards/Columns per Row
attribute_definition_groups.description: How many cards should be shown at each breakpoint?

attribute_definitions.name: Mobile
attribute_definitions.description: The number of columns of cards to use on mobile sceens. Default is 1 column.

attribute_definitions.name: Tablet
attribute_definitions.description: The number of columns of cards to use on tablet sceens. Default is 2 columns.

attribute_definitions.name: Desktop
attribute_definitions.description: The number of columns of cards to use on desktop sceens. Default is 3 columns.
